mapper.sql: MBGL_ID, MBGL_NAME, MBGL_TYPE, MBGL_SSDW, MBGL_CONTENT, MBGL_ADDTIME
mapper.select:
select
from MBGL where 1=1
and MBGL_TYPE like '%${type}%'
and MBGL_SSDW = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from (select * from MBGL where MBGL_TYPE = '测评通知' union all select * from MBGL where MBGL_TYPE != '测评通知' and MBGL_SSDW = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) T where MBGL_TYPE IN
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and MBGL_NAME like '%${keywords}%'
order by T.MBGL_ID desc ) as t1 order by MBGL_ID asc) as t2 order by MBGL_ADDTIME desc
mapper.insert:
insert into MBGL
MBGL_ID,
MBGL_NAME,
MBGL_TYPE,
MBGL_SSDW,
MBGL_CONTENT,
MBGL_ADDTIME,
#{mbglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mbglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mbglType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mbglSsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mbglContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mbglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update MBGL
MBGL_NAME = #{mbglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MBGL_TYPE = #{mbglType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MBGL_SSDW = #{mbglSsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MBGL_CONTENT = #{mbglContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MBGL_ADDTIME = #{mbglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where MBGL_ID = #{mbglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MBGL set MBGL_NAME = #{mbglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MBGL_TYPE = #{mbglType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MBGL_SSDW = #{mbglSsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MBGL_CONTENT = #{mbglContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MBGL_ADDTIME = #{mbglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MBGL_ID = #{mbglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
